mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: List of Parliamentary Resolutions about prices and entry ports for different types of grains imported by Britain; Bill should be drafted of these agreements; House committee will meet Monday to consider encouraging the importation of various types of grains; Jefferson made corrections of amounts Britain should import from America and added amount of Indian corn and meat that Britain should import.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1801, n.p.
